meanings.sent1: The unpolled votes were not included in the final tally.
meanings.sent2: The unpolled data remained unnoticed in the report.
meanings.sent3: The unpolled cookies mysteriously disappeared from the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her unpolled talent shone brightly during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The unpolled stars twinkled in the night sky, unseen by many.

meanings.definition: Not having been subjected to a poll or survey
meanings.sent1: The unpolled group had diverse opinions that were not captured.
meanings.sent2: The unpolled participants were not part of the research findings.
meanings.sent3: The unpolled students surprised everyone with their unique answers.
meanings.sent4: Her unpolled thoughts were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unpolled forest remained untouched by human influence, a rare sight.
